articles.author: Megan Messerly, Daniel Desrochers, Ben Lefebvre, Jack Detsch
articles.title: ‘I hope he’s right’: Markets tumble on tariffs — but Trump isn’t flinching - Politico
articles.description: Americans watched in horror as their 401(k)s plunged Thursday morning after the markets opened.
articles.content:
And many Republicans were left offering lukewarm defenses of Trumps new tariffs.
I hope he is right. I hope the naysayers are wrong, said Sen. Ron Johnson, (R-Wisc.). I dont know.
